column6: The Invaders return to the scene of their darkest moment from World War II-and their most feared enemies are waiting to meet them!  Warrior Woman, U-Man, Master Man and a brand new Alex Ross-designed Iron Cross would be challenge enough, but there are larger forces at work...dark forces that tip the scales against the Invaders and will turn one of them against the others by issue's end! Rated T  ...$3.99
column7: | Captain America | Human Torch (Jim Hammond) | Spitfire | Sub-Mariner | Union Jack (Joseph Chapman) | Winter Soldier
